author: O V
comment: Almost perfect. The developer(s) need better curating. It's not that the art choice is bad, I've actually enjoyed that. However the quality of certain works is too pixelated for today's screens. Please consider only using higher resolution images

author: Allen Hossin
comment: Used to work great. Now it has trouble changing wallpapers on its own. I've had this problem with multiple phones. It'll work if I change to wifi only, and then stop working. And then if I change it to not wifi only, it'll work for a bit and then stop. Wish it would work all the time.

author: F Deeb
comment: It's gone back to getting stuck on one wallpaper and only showing half of it. I have to change sources, restart my phone to sometimes get it to work again. I use this app with backdrops.

author: David Bouchard
comment: First app I put on all my devices. Beautiful. The lastest update is great. The only thing that would make this perfect for me at least it's to add an option to stop wallpaper scrolling. I know some custom launchers do this but I actually prefer stock. Thanks for your hard work.

author: Shashank Surya
comment: Coming back to this app after 3 years only to find that you still haven't given us an option to resize or adjust the wallpapers to our screens! It's not even scrollable! Beautiful app but it's all a waste if it won't fit our screens!

author: Noah Demko
comment: Works well for it's intended purpose and looks pretty. There should be a feature to adjust wallpapers on that are being used. If there's an error, it should tell you what file cannot be opened.

author: Burhanudin Syed
comment: It's a great idea and used to work pretty well but the wallpapers always get stuck on a picture no matter the source or the update interval making the app pretty much useless.

author: Alex Arellano
comment: Un intuitive. Uninstalled - When selecting wallpapers you must do it one photo at a time (can't select multiple)  - when done you're brought to an editing page that has no "launch"  or submit/proceed" button I suppose you just exit the app.  - Editing options for lock/home screen affect the opposite screen (lock screen settings affect home screen instead)  - lock screen doesn't even change to the wallpaper selected

author: Ben Green
comment: Love the app but most of the time it doesn't change the wallpaper as scheduled on my S6 Edge which is really annoying, even when I go into the app and press the next arrow a lot of the time the wallpaper won't change. I have uninstalled/re-installed and cleared the cache etc with no success, it works perfectly on my Pixel C tablet so must be an issue with my phone which is running Nova launcher btw. Other than that I think its one of the best wallpaper apps out there.

author: Abel de Wit
comment: Love the app, just one question for a feature update: Right now we can choose to not blur when on the lockscreen and I was wondering if it could be introduced that you can swap this. I'd like to have a sharp image on my home screen and have it blurred on my lockscreen. Is this possible?

author: Corey Whitworth
comment: Came back to Muzei after a few months after reading there had been "substantial internal improvements" ...which still don't include the ability to adjust the positioning of wallpapers.  Can't be that substantial if most negative comments reference that feature lacking and you don't address it. Oh, and upgrading to this latest version managed to blow out my selection of images from My Pictures and you can only select and add one image at a time?   How many reviews does it take to get a feature implemented?!   I'd happily pay for a version that let's you reposition.

Can't believe the images still don't fit the screen. Thanks a lot for the pointless "options" to blurr the image (who doesn't want blurry art??!!) but still nothing to re-size/recenter the image properly. Yet again the verdict is: uninstall.

author: Manuel Ojeda Burgos
comment: Great app. Just one tiny thing: I want to adjust the wallpaper of the day manually if the chosen part of the painting is not the best of the whole.

author: saathiyaana artxtra
comment: FANtastic..!!  Used so many WP apps.. This is much better.. as compared to other automatic WP changer.. Provided Double Tap feature l like the most..  My Fav.Top 10 WP List(Free) ..Which l frequently use...  1-Wallpaper Changer by J4velin 2-MultiPicture Live WP by lllllT 3-SB Wallpaper by Shirobakama724 4-Live Wallpaper Loops by Ima 5-Smart WP by FeedK  6-Everyday Wallpaper by Nitin3210 7-7fon Wallpapers  8-Casualis WP by TangoDev  9- Muzei Live WP by Roman & lan lO-GIF Live WP-Lite by AlphaPk

author: Joel Slade
comment: It won't change backgrounds within so many minutes even when you state it in your settings. I'm unsure if this is a to do with my battery settings (medium, S8).

First time giving review for an app. This is amazing, I've been looking for a wallpaper app that has a dynamic function + great collection of wallpapers, and this app got both! Plus I really love that you can also put your own collection of wallpapers!

author: Cory McKenzie
comment: It never worked when I used Twilight and now on my V30 it never updates regardless of overlays. The Tumblr plug in has been stuck for weeks.

author: Brandon Sorensen
comment: Best wallpaper app out there, just choose your source and it please try blurs the background.

author: Lia Fields
comment: Keeps freezing the wallpaper and I have restart it.

author: Austin Mageles
comment: Neat concept, fairly lightweight, allows for third party modules and more!
do not know how to use it.just waist time.

author: Suniva Chitrakar
comment: I wish there was a feature that changed the wallpaper into parallax wallpapers. other than this it's great.

author: Parteek Dheri
comment: Loved it.  Devs, can we get non sliding wallpaper as option? I will like if my wallpaper is not split on multiple screens..

author: Taroon Tyagi
comment: Specially for those who are too lazy to customise their homescreen.

author: Mahesh Arunachalam
comment: Kindly allow to set multiple sources. But app is slow enough without it. Otherwise outstanding.

author: Rob Bourne
comment: Why does it decide to stop updating every now and then?

author: Sanoj S Nair
comment: Images are not fit for home screen after latest update.

author: Wes P
comment: Best wallpaper app ever, beautiful, a surprise every time you turn on your phone, and relaxing.

author: Kruno Orešković
comment: Simply great app
Its good.Not updating wallpaper automatically even at full internet access.Great app . Thankyou

author: Action Jackson
comment: Great app, wish it would auto size the images.  Auto Fit to screen!!!

author: Dmitrii Vacula
comment: Very original wallpaper app

author: Matias Muller
comment: Won't let me change the wallpaper when I sulking backdrops as the source

author: Luke H
comment: Fantastic array of features, very useful and just overall awesome.

author: Bozidar Tosic
comment: Would be better if we could align the image to our liking

author: Bilal Celen
comment: İt is not working a few weeks. I have loved app.

author: Ben Hirsh
comment: This is such a good app

author: Roberto Beccherle
comment: Wonderful

author: Carmen Sanchez
comment: Very nice

author: Alexa Crans
comment: it's a good
